content.description: super bouldery crux right off the ground

Man in the Boat comes out of the left side of the cave and takes you right into a deadpoint/dyno to a good hold. From there, move straight up to a brick type feature sticking out of a dish (the Man int eh Boat). Continue on to the anchors. 

  This is a very high quality 5.12 climb. Gently overhanging with fun holds.
content.location: Come out of the left side of the cave.

content.description: Buena Vista offers a selection of sport climbs ranging from 5.10 to 5.13d. The wall is east facing and gets sun in the morning to mid-day. This area is climbable all winter, though some days are too cold and windy.The rock is relatively good limestone.The area was developed by Flyn' Brian McCray and Mike Lewis in 2000 - 2001.To the right of the cave, there are a few 5.10s and 5.11s. The cave offers a very good 5.13d, as well as a project. Left of the cave has a slew of 5.12s.
